posts.post_content:
Cards are no longer for sale.

I have some T206 HOFers that I am trying to sell if interested please email me at [url]steveskibel@aol.com[/url]. I accept Paypal Gift or Personal Check. Shipping is $5.00 and includes insurance.

T206 Speaker SGC 40   Polar Bear   
T206 Lajoie    SGC 40   Old Mill        
T206 Waddell  PSA 2.5  Piedmont     
T206 Cobb      SGC 30  Polar Bear    
T206 Johnson  PSA  3

I know I can't afford them, but thought I'd post that I loved opening your sale thread.  In my opinion, the Cobb, Johnson, and Lajoie are 3 of the nicest looking cards in the set and my favorite pose of each player from the set.  One day I'll own them, although the quality will be less than yours.  It was just nice to see 3 of my favorite T206 cards :) .  Good luck with the sales.
